code: import React from"react";import{Button}from"@material-ui/core";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{addToCart}from"../../actions/cart";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import"./CardProduct.scss";import{calculateDiscount,formatCurrency}from"../../util/util";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";CardProduct.defaultProps={itemProduct:{},addCardClick:null};function CardProduct(props){var itemProduct=props.itemProduct;var disPatch=useDispatch();var history=useHistory();function addItemToCart(item){disPatch(addToCart(item));history.push("/cart-detail");}function navigateDetail(itemProduct){history.push({pathname:"/product/".concat(itemProduct.id),state:{id:itemProduct.id}});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"CardProduct",children:[itemProduct.discount?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"PercentDiscount",children:[itemProduct.discount,"%"]}):itemProduct.isHot?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"HotProduct",children:"HOT"}):"",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ImageProduct",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"Image",src:itemProduct.imageUrl,alt:itemProduct.imageUrl})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ProductDetail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"ProductName",onClick:function onClick(){navigateDetail(itemProduct);},children:itemProduct.productName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"Price",children:[itemProduct.discount?formatCurrency(calculateDiscount(itemProduct.price,itemProduct.discount)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\xA0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"Currency",children:"\u0111"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Discount",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("del",{children:[formatCurrency(itemProduct.price),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"Currency",children:"\u0111"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"BtnBuy",onClick:function onClick(){return addItemToCart(itemProduct);},children:"Mua"})]})]});}export default CardProduct;
